Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed after the execution of SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total waiting time to the SW-Reviewer Agreed following SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and the subsequent occurrence of SW-Reviewer Declined in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to SW-EIC Major Revision across variants that include both activities
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and Manuscript Export Succeeded in revised submission phases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed in high-complexity variants (e.g., those with multiple reviewer declines)
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and the next SW-AE Assign Reviewers, indicating reassignment necessity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Agreed to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in major revision paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Agreed and First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' and activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time for SW-Reviewer Agreed grouped by case:concept:name
Average cycle time of SW-Reviewer Agreed in cases that eventually lead to SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'begin': activity == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'", 'end': "activity == 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit'", 'aggregation': 'average'}"
